import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import { defaultPostImage} from '../../constants/constants' import classes from './Post.module.css' const Posts = ({post}) => { const img = post.picture ? `/post/photo/${post._id}` : defaultPostImage return (
{post.category.map((cat,index)=>( {cat} ))}
{post.title}
{new Date(post.createdAt).toDateString()}

{post.description}

) } export default Posts
